TopicTitle: White Monkey Kitchenware and SpaceParts Factory - ver 0.4 - HOPE SHUTTLE

Articles.Content: Yeah, time for an update, 0.15 broke your plugin.

Give him time. He most likely may have a life outside of KSP and modding.

Plus he hasn\'t been on for three days and probably isn\'t even aware the update is out.
O_O god know how long .15 has been now and the Hope shuttle is STILL not fixed

O_O god know how long .15 has been now and the Hope shuttle is STILL not fixed

It\'s been less than a week.

It\'s been less than a week.

Ha! However, science has proven that time goes by four times more slowly when you\'re waiting.

Hey guys!

I\'m not dead yet - just super busy - even more than usual - I started a new full time job this week.

Shame about the 0.15 breaking the plugin, but hey, the plugins were experimental as hell

I\'ll be traveling this weekend, maybe I\'ll be able to take a look at it on the train.

Sorry but I currently have no idea when an update will happen - between my new job and BF3 addiction, there\'s not much time left for Kerbals.
but 0.15 supports animations now so....
better hurry, my SF-IPS project is reliant on the Hope cargobay

Hello,

I did a quick&dirty fix for the CargoBay and MultiJoin plugins, as already said to Sarkun by PM if he want i\'ll remove them asap but since i love these parts i fixed them somehow.

Do the followng in Plugin folder:

Delete PKSCargoBay.dll

Replace PKSMultiJointObject.dll with the attached one

Note: i was unable to make the PKSCargoBay.dll works so i merged it\'s functionality with PKSMultiJointObject.dll, it\'s quick and dirty but it works as long as the author don\'t make a proper fix

Hello,

I did a quick&dirty fix for the CargoBay and MultiJoin plugins, as already said to Sarkun by PM if he want i\'ll remove them asap but since i love these parts i fixed them somehow.

Do the followng in Plugin folder:

Delete PKSCargoBay.dll

Replace PKSMultiJointObject.dll with the attached one

Note: i was unable to make the PKSCargoBay.dll works so i merged it\'s functionality with PKSMultiJointObject.dll, it\'s quick and dirty but it works as long as the author don\'t make a proper fix

Seems to have a bug where the camera will recenter way below the rocket, and make the game think that the rocket is extremely long due to where the camera is centered. If I just have the shuttle launch by itself it doesn\'t recenter the view below the rocket though, since there isn\'t a rocket.
That bug was caused by Tosh\'s old cart.dll, if you are not using the cart.dll or are already using the latest version then CleverWalrus may need to contact Tosh to find out what was causing it.

That bug was caused by Tosh\'s old cart.dll, if you are not using the cart.dll or are already using the latest version then CleverWalrus may need to contact Tosh to find out what was causing it.

I\'m using the cart.dll that comes with hstwcart 1.3.2, is there a newer version that has fixed the bug?
That is the fixed version, so whatever is causing this may be in CleverWalruses .dll instead, seeing as it is doing the same thing he may have run into the same problem Tosh had.

That is the fixed version, so whatever is causing this may be in CleverWalruses .dll instead, seeing as it is doing the same thing he may have run into the same problem Tosh had.

I see, thanks.

Considering the amount of editing that i did (1 line of code and repacking) i would say that is very difficult that the problem is caused by the 'temporarly fixed' DLL, it\'s more like the problem is between 0.15 and the DLL functionalities that need a re-work or update from the author, can u attach a .craft file for reproducing the problem? i played all last night with this DLL and had no problem regarding cameras.

It is the .craft file that comes with the experimental release of this mod. (The able rocket with hope + cargo, doesn\'t matter whether it is the meek version or not) I also created my own launch vehicle to see if it was a problem with the .craft file, and i had the same problem.

The plugins don\'t working in KSP 0.15.1.

Do you want it to update so that I and other players can use it in 0.15.

Tnx .
Cargo bay is not working with 0.15.2, even with most up-to-date MuMech release. What\'s the fix (short of a rebuild of the files...)?
If you are able to fix it, fix it. Just make sure you let OP who made the post know of your doings and that if they want you will remove it.

There isn\'t a fix short of sarkun updating his own plugin; Even if he were active I\'m not sure he would, since you can pretty much build the cargobay in the default partslab now. Main thing we\'re missing is a way to customize the activate key (its tied to the landing gear toggle currently.)
also noticed attatchment nodes don\'t work on the wings...on spaceplane hangar at least
Too bad! i really like the cargo bay stuff!
not seeing much activity, how\'s progress with the bugfixing sarkun?
